committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the President to halt all exports of crude oil, gasoline, No. 2 fuel oil, and propane gas until he determines that no shortage of such fuels exists in the United States.

summary.text: Directs the President to halt all exports of crude oil, gasoline, number 2 fuel oil, and propane gas until he determines that no shortage of such fuels exists in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the President to halt all exports of crude oil, gasoline, No. 2 fuel oil, and propane gas until he determines that no shortage of such fuels exists in the United States.
